About

I'm an undergraduate psychology student, working at Lab25 of the School of Psychology at UNAM. I'm interested in cognitive psychology, specifically in learning, mathematical modeling, Bayesian inference and musical cognition. I'm currently developing my thesis project, whose main focus is categorization.
